description: Adds or updates the delivery options for a configuration set.

parameters.name: ConfigurationSetName
parameters.description: The name of the configuration set.

parameters.name: DeliveryOptions
parameters.description: Specifies whether messages that use the configuration set are required to use Transport Layer Security (TLS). TlsPolicy (string) --- Specifies whether messages that use the configuration set are required to use Transport Layer Security (TLS). If the value is Require, messages are only delivered if a TLS connection can be established. If the value is Optional, messages can be delivered in plain text if a TLS connection can't be established.

nested_params.name: TlsPolicy
nested_params.description: Specifies whether messages that use the configuration set are required to use Transport Layer Security (TLS). If the value is Require, messages are only delivered if a TLS connection can be established. If the value is Optional, messages can be delivered in plain text if a TLS connection can't be established.
